value.title: Power BI Week Number (Weeknum) in Date Table #Q&A
value.excerpt: Week Numbers (Weeknum) in Power BI Date Table (Calendar Table) are extremely useful. Watch video to learn more and Download the Power BI file in Video at https://www.learnpowerbi.com/download   Week Numbers can allow you to show your data • Week over Week • Weekly Averages • Rolling Week Period …and

value.title: All About DAX.do - Milwaukee Power Platform User Group
value.excerpt: The Milwaukee Brew City User group is hosting the monthly Power BI User Group meeting.  Kevin Arnold Director of Architecture from Expert Analytics will be providing us a full demo of the website DAX.do  Visit PowerBI.tips : https://powerbi.tips  Visit Chicago User Group:  https://community.powerbi.com/t5/Chicago-Power-BI-User-Group/gh-p/pbi_chicago_usergroup

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Dual Y Axis Chart
value.excerpt: Make a custom visual to have two Y-Axis scales in Power BI. value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Intro to Tabular Editor
value.excerpt: Tabular Editor is an incredible Tool that enables users to manipulate a Tabular Model at lighting speeds.  Daniel Otykier is the creator of Tabular Editor.  This video will explain the basic functionalities of the program.    Watch the full Series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLn1m_aBmgsbGvz4SsmO_fkeThjDUSWFkf

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Model Performance Tuning in DAX Studio - By Marco Russo
value.excerpt: DAX Studio is the tool for data model tuning.  Marco Russo contributor to DAX Studio will be giving us a deep dive and demo around using DAX Studio for Model Performance Tuning.   You will not want to miss this event as Marco is a wealth of knowledge for all things Data Modeling!  Watch the Full Tutorial

value.title: 3 Minutes Learning: Sort Month in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn quickly in less than 2 minutes how to sort month names based on the correct order of month in Power BI http://radacad.com   Prelude No. 20 by Chris Zabriskie is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/) Source: http://chriszabriskie.com/preludes/
